item.title: Robinhood plans to launch its own blockchain, offers ‘Stock Tokens’ in EU
item.description: The online brokerage continues to expand its crypto footprint after laying out nearly $400 million for two recent crypto acquisitions.

item.title: Serena Williams says talent alone only gets you so far: For career success, like tennis, you have to grind ‘every day’
item.description: The 43-year-old tennis icon says humility and perseverance are key to success, echoing other leaders like Brian Niccol, Steve Jobs, and Mark Cuban.

item.title: GoFundMe launches new funds aimed at maximizing charitable donations
item.description: GoFundMe is launching Giving Funds, a type of donor-advised fund.

item.title: How this CEO built a 35-year reign at Aflac without burning out
item.description: Aflac’s Dan Amos has outlasted market cycles, activist investors, and generational change

item.title: 87% of business leaders think AI agents will replace human employees if companies don’t make big moves to upskill their workforce
item.description: “As employers, we have a responsibility to help prepare current and future workers for the transition to a new era of work.”
